name: USC Alumni Networking Night
description: Exclusive networking event for USC alumni and current students. Connect with industry leaders and fellow Trojans.

name: Trojan Tech Talks - AI Innovation
description: Private seminar featuring USC faculty and tech industry experts discussing the latest in AI and machine learning.

name: USC Career Fair - Premium Access
description: Early access to the USC Career Fair. Meet with top employers before the public session.

name: Cinema Arts Screening & Q&A
description: Exclusive screening of student films followed by Q&A with award-winning directors.

name: Entrepreneurship Workshop
description: Private workshop with successful USC entrepreneurs. Learn about startup funding, pitching, and scaling.
